title: Why am I Not Getting Keys?
body:
Ok, so for the past 2 months I've been playing quite a lot and managed to put in 100+ games, but i haven't received ONE key fragment the entire time.
 I did get a 14 day suspension way back, but it said i was available for rewards now. I have been able to receive  chests and missions but I'm not getting any keys. is this just a bug? Can anybody explain to me what could be the reason for this?

replies.body: Hmmmm it actually looks like this account is currently banned, which would mean you couldn't play much less get keys.If you're talking about a different account I can look over that one as well if you shoot me that summoner name.
I havent gotten a key frag in months either
